cause.description:
In support of "the fundamental right of each individual, throughout the world, to manage his or her fertility, regardless of the individual's income, marital status, race, ethnicity, sexual orientation, age, national origin, or residence. We believe that respect and value for diversity in all aspects of our organization are essential to our well-being. We believe that reproductive self-determination must be voluntary and preserve the individual's right to privacy. We further believe that such self-determination will contribute to an enhancement of the quality of life, strong family relationships, and population stability." Planned Parenthood Federation of America Mission Statement
1. Access to accurate information in classrooms and "pregnancy crisis centers" is paramount to making informed reproductive choices
2. The right to the freedom of choice in all reproductive matters
3. Access to birth control, including Emergency Contraception should be universal and affordable
cause.mission: Promote the right of all people to make their own reproductive choices
cause.name: Reproductive Rights
